TopicTitle: Try to overtake the current land speed record

Articles.Content:
Today I overtook SWDennis, who had the land speed record for more than 7 Months (1528 m/s), but today I overtook him by more than 200 m/s (1759 m/s).

Rules: No cheating!, No taking off the ground and just diving into the sea!

Try to overtake me, good luck!
